msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

author.persName: نور محمد بن عین الملک شیرازی

msItem.title: Tarab al-Sibyan.
msItem.note: Headings and some punctuation in red. A few pages have margins crudely drawn freehand. A manuscript of very poor quality in all respects.
msItem.incipit: Ba'd az hamd bi-'add WD (hamd u thanay in India office MS) mar hadrat-i wahid al-samad

listBibl.bibl: The only MS noted by Storey.

bindingDesc.p: Has previously escaped being catalogued, but is kept inside the binding of Codrington/Reade No 232 and presumably is the second work mentioned in the slip pasted in the back cover of that book and entered the collection with it. Unbound; may once have had a binding.

acquisition.p: Presumably bequeathed by Major David Price.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
